    Just a few things I have learned along the way

    Brent Gaither

    About me

    I'm a Software engineer and a biologist. I started programming in college and I really dove in when I learned about bioinformatics. In my spare time I'm also a climber, skier and runner.

    Febuary 16th 2016 Matching Sequences This is a simple introduction into bioinformatics using python. Walk through how to match up DNA sequences using python strings.
    Febuary 16th 2016 Needleman–Wunsch Algorithm A new look on an old problem. How to match sequences more effectivly with the Needleman-Wunsch algorithm.
